"Description for enum type: ProtocolType"
enum ProtocolType {
  "Represents a protocol for exchanging assets"
  EXCHANGE
  "Represents a protocol for lending assets"
  LENDING
  "Represents a protocol for generating yield"
  YIELD
  "Represents a protocol for bridging assets across networks"
  BRIDGE
  "Represents a generic protocol type"
  GENERIC
}

"Description for enum type: CrosschainTokenType"
enum CrosschainTokenType {
  "Represents a token that is wrapped for use on a different blockchain"
  WRAPPED
  "Represents the original token on its native blockchain"
  CANONICAL
}

"Description for enum type: BridgePoolType"
enum BridgePoolType {
  "LOCK_RELEASE"
  LOCK_RELEASE
  "BURN_MINT"
  BURN_MINT
  "LIQUIDITY"
  LIQUIDITY
}

"Description for enum type: BridgePermissionType"
enum BridgePermissionType {
  "Allows unrestricted access without any permissions required."
  PERMISSIONLESS
  "Requires users to be on a whitelist to gain access."
  WHITELIST
  "Restricts access to a private group with specific permissions."
  PRIVATE
}

"Description for table: Token"
type Token @entity @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the token, stored as bytes."
  id: Bytes!
  "Name of the token."
  name: String!
  "Symbol representing the token."
  symbol: String!
  "Number of decimal places used by the token."
  decimals: Int!
  "The last recorded price of the token in USD."
  lastPriceUSD: BigDecimal
  "Block number at which the last price was recorded."
  lastPriceBlockNumber: BigInt
}

"Description for table: CrosschainToken"
type CrosschainToken @entity(immutable: true) @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the crosschain token, stored as bytes."
  id: Bytes!
  "Identifier for the blockchain network, represented as a big integer."
  chainID: BigInt!
  "The network on which the token exists, defined by the Network type."
  network: Network!
  "The address of the token, stored as bytes."
  address: Bytes!
  "The type of crosschain token, specified by the CrosschainTokenType."
  type: CrosschainTokenType!
  "Reference to the associated token, if available."
  token: Token
}

"Description for enum type: RewardTokenType"
enum RewardTokenType {
  "Represents a reward token type associated with deposit actions."
  DEPOSIT
  "Represents a reward token type associated with borrow actions."
  BORROW
}

"Description for table: RewardToken"
type RewardToken @entity(immutable: true) @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the reward token, represented as a byte array."
  id: Bytes!
  "Reference to the associated token entity."
  token: Token!
  "Categorization of the reward token type."
  type: RewardTokenType!
}

"Unique identifier for the protocol"
interface Protocol {
  "Unique identifier for the protocol"
  id: Bytes!
  "Name of the protocol"
  name: String!
  "Slug or short name for the protocol"
  slug: String!
  "Version of the schema used"
  schemaVersion: String!
  "Version of the subgraph"
  subgraphVersion: String!
  "Version of the methodology applied"
  methodologyVersion: String!
  "Network on which the protocol operates"
  network: Network!
  "Type of the protocol"
  type: ProtocolType!
  "Total value locked in USD"
  totalValueLockedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Value controlled by the protocol in USD"
  protocolControlledValueUSD: BigDecimal
  "Cumulative revenue from the supply side in USD"
  cumulativeSupplySideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the protocol side in USD"
  cumulativeProtocolSideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative total revenue in USD"
  cumulativeTotalRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total number of unique users"
  cumulativeUniqueUsers: Int!
  "Daily usage metrics snapshots"
  dailyUsageMetrics: [UsageMetricsDailySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "Hourly usage metrics snapshots"
  hourlyUsageMetrics: [UsageMetricsHourlySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "Daily financial metrics snapshots"
  financialMetrics: [FinancialsDailySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "List of pools associated with the protocol"
  pools: [Pool!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
}

"Description for table: BridgeProtocol"
type BridgeProtocol implements Protocol @entity @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the bridge protocol."
  id: Bytes!
  "Name of the bridge protocol."
  name: String!
  "Slug or short identifier for the bridge protocol."
  slug: String!
  "Version of the schema used by the bridge protocol."
  schemaVersion: String!
  "Version of the subgraph for the bridge protocol."
  subgraphVersion: String!
  "Version of the methodology applied to the bridge protocol."
  methodologyVersion: String!
  "Network on which the bridge protocol operates."
  network: Network!
  "Type of protocol, indicating its specific category."
  type: ProtocolType!
  "Type of permission required for the bridge protocol."
  permissionType: BridgePermissionType!
  "Total value locked in USD within the bridge protocol."
  totalValueLockedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total value exported in USD by the bridge protocol."
  totalValueExportedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Total value imported in USD by the bridge protocol."
  totalValueImportedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Value controlled by the protocol in USD."
  protocolControlledValueUSD: BigDecimal
  "Cumulative revenue from the supply side in USD."
  cumulativeSupplySideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the protocol side in USD."
  cumulativeProtocolSideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative total revenue in USD."
  cumulativeTotalRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative volume of transactions in USD entering the protocol."
  cumulativeVolumeInUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative volume of transactions in USD exiting the protocol."
  cumulativeVolumeOutUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative total volume of transactions in USD."
  cumulativeTotalVolumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Net volume of transactions in USD."
  netVolumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative count of unique users interacting with the protocol."
  cumulativeUniqueUsers: Int!
  "Cumulative count of unique users sending transfers."
  cumulativeUniqueTransferSenders: Int!
  "Cumulative count of unique users receiving transfers."
  cumulativeUniqueTransferReceivers: Int!
  "Cumulative count of unique liquidity providers."
  cumulativeUniqueLiquidityProviders: Int!
  "Cumulative count of unique users sending messages."
  cumulativeUniqueMessageSenders: Int!
  "Cumulative count of all transactions."
  cumulativeTransactionCount: Int!
  "Cumulative count of transfers sent out."
  cumulativeTransferOutCount: Int!
  "Cumulative count of transfers received."
  cumulativeTransferInCount: Int!
  "Cumulative count of liquidity deposits."
  cumulativeLiquidityDepositCount: Int!
  "Cumulative count of liquidity withdrawals."
  cumulativeLiquidityWithdrawCount: Int!
  "Cumulative count of messages sent."
  cumulativeMessageSentCount: Int!
  "Cumulative count of messages received."
  cumulativeMessageReceivedCount: Int!
  "List of networks supported by the bridge protocol."
  supportedNetworks: [Network!]!
  "Total number of pools associated with the protocol."
  totalPoolCount: Int!
  "Total number of pool routes available."
  totalPoolRouteCount: Int!
  "Total number of canonical routes available."
  totalCanonicalRouteCount: Int!
  "Total number of wrapped routes available."
  totalWrappedRouteCount: Int!
  "Total number of supported tokens."
  totalSupportedTokenCount: Int!
  "Daily usage metrics snapshots derived from the protocol."
  dailyUsageMetrics: [UsageMetricsDailySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "Hourly usage metrics snapshots derived from the protocol."
  hourlyUsageMetrics: [UsageMetricsHourlySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "Financial metrics snapshots derived from the protocol."
  financialMetrics: [FinancialsDailySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
  "List of pools derived from the protocol."
  pools: [Pool!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")
}

  totalValueImportedUSD: BigDecimal!

"Description for table: Pool"
type Pool @entity @regularPolling {
  "Unique identifier for the pool"
  id: Bytes!
  "Protocol associated with the pool"
  protocol: BridgeProtocol!
  "Name of the pool"
  name: String
  "Symbol representing the pool"
  symbol: String
  "Relation identifier in bytes"
  relation: Bytes
  "Type of the bridge pool"
  type: BridgePoolType!
  "Token used as input in the pool"
  inputToken: Token!
  "Tokens available as destinations in cross-chain operations"
  destinationTokens: [CrosschainToken!]!
  "Routes associated with the pool"
  routes: [PoolRoute!]!
  "Token output from the pool"
  outputToken: Token
  "Tokens given as rewards"
  rewardTokens: [RewardToken!]
  "Timestamp when the pool was created"
  createdTimestamp: BigInt!
  "Block number at the time of pool creation"
  createdBlockNumber: BigInt!
  "Total supply of minted tokens"
  mintSupply: BigInt
  "Balance of the input token"
  inputTokenBalance: BigInt!
  "Total value locked in USD"
  totalValueLockedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Net value exported in USD"
  netValueExportedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the supply side in USD"
  cumulativeSupplySideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the protocol side in USD"
  cumulativeProtocolSideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative total revenue in USD"
  cumulativeTotalRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative volume of tokens entering the pool"
  cumulativeVolumeIn: BigInt!
  "Cumulative volume of tokens exiting the pool"
  cumulativeVolumeOut: BigInt!
  "Net volume of tokens"
  netVolume: BigInt!
  "Cumulative volume of tokens entering the pool in USD"
  cumulativeVolumeInUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative volume of tokens exiting the pool in USD"
  cumulativeVolumeOutUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Net volume in USD"
  netVolumeUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Supply of the output token"
  outputTokenSupply: BigInt
  "Price of the output token in USD"
  outputTokenPriceUSD: BigDecimal
  "Amount of output tokens staked"
  stakedOutputTokenAmount: BigInt
  "Amount of reward tokens emitted"
  rewardTokenEmissionsAmount: [BigInt!]
  "Value of reward token emissions in USD"
  rewardTokenEmissionsUSD: [BigDecimal!]
  "Daily snapshots of the pool's state"
  dailySnapshots: [PoolDailySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "pool")
  "Hourly snapshots of the pool's state"
  hourlySnapshots: [PoolHourlySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "pool")
  "Timestamp of the last daily snapshot"
  _lastDailySnapshotTimestamp: BigInt
  "Timestamp of the last hourly snapshot"
  _lastHourlySnapshotTimestamp: BigInt
  "Liquidity balance of the input token"
  _inputTokenLiquidityBalance: BigInt
}

"Description for table: PoolRoute"
type PoolRoute @entity @regularPolling {

  cumulativeVolumeOutUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Timestamp when the pool route was created"
  createdTimestamp: BigInt!

  createdBlockNumber: BigInt!
}

"Description for enum type: ProtocolType"
enum ProtocolType {
  "Represents a protocol for exchanging assets"

  "Represents a protocol for lending assets"
  LENDING
  "Represents a protocol for generating yield"
  YIELD

"Description for enum type: ProtocolType"

}

  PRIVATE
}

"Description for enum type: TransferType"

"Description for table: BridgeTransfer"

"Description for table: BridgeMessage"

  "Source address"

  "Chain ID of the destination blockchain"

"Description for table: Account"
type Account @entity @regularPolling {

"Description for enum type: ProtocolType"
enum ProtocolType {
  "Represents a protocol for exchanging assets"
  EXCHANGE
  "Represents a protocol for lending assets"
  LENDING
  "Represents a protocol for generating yield"
  YIELD

}

}

"Unique identifier for the protocol"
interface Protocol {

  "Cumulative revenue from the protocol side in USD"
  cumulativeProtocolSideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!

  financialMetrics: [FinancialsDailySnapshot!]! @derivedFrom(field: "protocol")

}

"Description for enum type: ProtocolType"
enum ProtocolType {
  "Represents a protocol for exchanging assets"
  EXCHANGE
  "Represents a protocol for lending assets"
  LENDING
  "Represents a protocol for generating yield"
  YIELD
  "Represents a protocol for bridging assets across networks"
  BRIDGE
  "Represents a generic protocol type"
  GENERIC
}

"Description for enum type: CrosschainTokenType"
enum CrosschainTokenType {
  "Represents a token that is wrapped for use on a different blockchain"
  WRAPPED
  "Represents the original token on its native blockchain"
  CANONICAL
}

"Description for enum type: BridgePoolType"
enum BridgePoolType {
  "LOCK_RELEASE"
  LOCK_RELEASE
  "BURN_MINT"
  BURN_MINT
  "LIQUIDITY"
  LIQUIDITY
}

"Description for enum type: BridgePermissionType"
enum BridgePermissionType {
  "Allows unrestricted access without any permissions required."
  PERMISSIONLESS
  "Requires users to be on a whitelist to gain access."
  WHITELIST
  "Restricts access to a private group with specific permissions."
  PRIVATE
}

}

"Unique identifier for the protocol"
interface Protocol {
  "Unique identifier for the protocol"

  slug: String!
  "Version of the schema used"
  schemaVersion: String!
  "Version of the subgraph"
  subgraphVersion: String!
  "Version of the methodology applied"
  methodologyVersion: String!
  "Network on which the protocol operates"
  network: Network!
  "Type of the protocol"
  type: ProtocolType!
  "Total value locked in USD"
  totalValueLockedUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Value controlled by the protocol in USD"
  protocolControlledValueUSD: BigDecimal
  "Cumulative revenue from the supply side in USD"
  cumulativeSupplySideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative revenue from the protocol side in USD"
  cumulativeProtocolSideRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!
  "Cumulative total revenue in USD"
  cumulativeTotalRevenueUSD: BigDecimal!

  "Hourly usage metrics snapshots"

}
